overview: This ghoulish hidden-camera show finds friends and family members setting up unsuspecting victims for pranks in elaborately staged and scary situations involving movie-style special effects and makeup. Volume Four includes: Tracy Tour Guide, Send in the Clowns, Tall Dark Ransom, The Happening... Again, The Set Up, Toilet Full of Scary, UFO Abduction, Vampire Bikers, Brother's Keeper, Werewolf Roadkill, Zombie Outbreak.
title: Scare Tactics: Volume 4
